name: Mohammed Ait Lahcen
body:
**Welcome!**

I'm a PhD student in economics at the University of Basel where I'm part of the [Economic Theory](https://wwz.unibas.ch/en/faculty/home/abteilung/witheo/) research group. My main research interests are:
* Monetary economics
* Labor economics
* Search and matching theory
* Computational economics
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
